name: SpecialDeals
definition: (((case when [DiscountAmount] IS NULL then (0) else (1) end+case when [DiscountPercentage] IS NULL then (0) else (1) end)+case when [UnitPrice] IS NULL then (0) else (1) end)=(1))

name: SpecialDeals
definition: ([StockItemID] IS NOT NULL AND [UnitPrice] IS NOT NULL OR [UnitPrice] IS NULL)
